include ("${EXTERNALS_LIB_LOCATION}/CMake-Register_External_Lib.txt")

set (SHA3_ARCHIVE "${SHA3_BUILTIN_LOCATION}/libsha3.a")

register_external_lib (libsha3 ${SHA3_BUILTIN_LOCATION} ${SHA3_ARCHIVE})

set (CMAKE_C_FLAGS "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS} -I${SHA3_BUILTIN_LOCATION}")
set (CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -I${SHA3_BUILTIN_LOCATION}")
